website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful fit and extremely comfortable microfiber fabric make these high-cut briefs a choice that won't disappoint and a close contender for our top spot.
pros: We love the microfiber material that is lightweight and breathable
Most wearers find that they don't bind, pinch, or ride up
cons: Material is on the thin side, but this isn't a major concern for most

customer_reviews.title: Current faves.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. Normally, I buy the cotton/lace highcut briefs in this brand. But, they did not have this color tone (sand). My nude version showed right through my light pink scrubs and looked like dark underwear showing through (white girl probs). I tried these even though I hesitate as a nurse to wear nylon/spandex undies. These were perfect for fair skin, the fit feels like a hug and the quality is much higher than what I was wearing. Now the complaint is that by the time you pay shipping, they dang well better be amazing. If it were a little cheaper, I would replace all of my old ones!
customer_reviews.author: Cderrick

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Underwear!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite underwear! Very comfortable, full coverage without being too much like "granny panties" and holds up well to many washings. I like that they are not bulky and do not show through my clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: I Finally Found Comfort
customer_reviews.text: i was looking for panties that 1)stay in place below the natural waistline, 2)do not leave elastic marks on my thighs, 3)that do not irritate my skin, especially at the hip bone area. These fit the bill. The fabric is soft and easily launders or hand washes. I am not aware of wearing them. They do not show through my pants. And they flatter my curves. I thought they were pretty expensive but they are worth it. I am over cheap panties!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer B

customer_reviews.title: Nice panty
customer_reviews.text: I really like these but this time I ordered they seem to run small or maybe I just gained weight!!
customer_reviews.author: wk

customer_reviews.title: These are my new favorites!
customer_reviews.text: These are my new favorites! Fit as expected, and silky smooth - no panty lines. Best of all these are high enough to prevent muffing top, without looking like granny panties. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: E. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Best buy - terrific fit
customer_reviews.text: I love these panties. They fit beautifully - no bunching, no pinching, and absolutely no muffin top. These are now the only panties I wear.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: These fit so well. Good quality. I first discovered them on a clearance rack at Marshall's. Likes them so much I ordered more when I found them on Amazon. They are far more expensive on Amazon but worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: the most comfortable panties I've ever had in my life (age 50)
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly, the most comfortable panties I've ever had in my life (age 50)
customer_reviews.author: Rick and Gina

customer_reviews.title: Best panties ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are just the best, most comfortable panties ever! I like the high cut briefs. I highly recommend these. Note:. I was them in the shower and hang to dry. They will pill eventually but by then it's time for new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Fits me well and husband loves them
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved these on me, they fit without rolling and are smooth. For my body they do not sag or pinch, and are attractive enough that my husband thought it was a bathing suit. I purchased five more, obviously. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Thinking about it

customer_reviews.title: Warners panties
customer_reviews.text: These briefs are comfortable, not dorky looking and continue to look good if washed in cold water and gently dried.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn S. Clay

customer_reviews.title: Great Panties!
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and no pinch panties. Love them. Will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Dubrasky

customer_reviews.title: Good panty, waistband visible under thinner clothing
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Well made, priced right, good coverage and very breathable. Cons: Not my go-to panty for wearing under thin dresses as the seam of the waistband sometimes shows through. Fine with jeans.
customer_reviews.author: OpalSkies

customer_reviews.title: Nice Underwear!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand. Worn it for years. Last well, fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Flo

customer_reviews.title: There are better Warners undies out there
customer_reviews.text: For some reason that is still mysterious to me, this pair of underwear does not fit as well as my other warners undies. I am generally a big fan of the brand, but this one just didnt seem to cut it. Ah well.
customer_reviews.author: res8g

customer_reviews.title: Love them as they do as they promise and they ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them as they do as they promise and they are affordable. They also feel so soft against the skin
customer_reviews.author: helen sheridan

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite underwear styles
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite underwear styles. Fabric is stretchy and silky feeling making it much easier to pull up your skinny jeans over there as well as keeping them in place with no riding up or bunching. No panty lines either. Great great lower price as compared to department stores.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Perfect panties
customer_reviews.text: I wear 7 or 8 depending on how they run. According to the reviews I read, several had commented that they run a bit small and this was great! I love them and they are the most comfy undies I have ever worn!!
customer_reviews.author: mimik

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Hi-Cut brief
customer_reviews.text: I have worn only Hi-Cuts briefs for years. These Hi-Cut Briefs fit perfectly and are so very soft and comfortable! With Amazon Prime, shipping was included in the price and delivery time was fast. - Anna
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Underwear
customer_reviews.text: Did not care for the feel of the fabric, very thin and slippery. Fit was good. And the product arrived as specified.
customer_reviews.author: Susan N. Krubl

customer_reviews.title: Like the Wide Band
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about the wide band around the waist but found it more comfortable than a regular band. Love the material.
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great product - fits perfectly, true to size! I highly endorse the product and the price is great too. Several colors!
customer_reviews.author: Scottsdale Writer

customer_reviews.title: so smooth
customer_reviews.text: very lightweight and comfortable I have several pairs now and won't buy anything else. No muffin top with these on.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like feel and fit
customer_reviews.text: Like feel and fit. Except elastic on leg openings a tat tight. I wear size 8 , so ordered size 7
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great panty. I like the higher leg and more ...
customer_reviews.text: Great panty. I like the higher leg and more coverage on the tummy. No panty line either. Can't get better than that.
customer_reviews.author: Kski

customer_reviews.title: Warner's knows how to fit them smoothly to your body.
customer_reviews.text: Love these underwear. Cotton crotch with great fit! Never disappointed with the quality and durability. Will always choose this style.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: I love these under wear
customer_reviews.text: I love these under wear. I ordered a small and they are a tad too big. I'm 5'2 and weigh 110 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Marti H.

customer_reviews.title: I love the design and Warner panties
customer_reviews.text: Turns out that I don't really care for this cut but that's no fault of the panty. I love the design and Warner panties. Think I will go back to Warner hipsters. I have never experienced a "bad" quality product by Warner. I stick with their brand.
customer_reviews.author: D. Swindell

product_meta.title: Warner's No Pinching No Problems Fit Hi-Cut Brief
product_meta.description: Get a relaxing fit in this Warners All Day Hi-Cut Brief. Product Features: Hi-cut brief, Flexible 4-way stretch, Innovative waist panel adds relaxing fit, No pinching, Lightweight silky microfiber fabric, Tagless, Fabric: Nylon/Spandex.
feature_bullets: Innovative waist panel adds relaxing fit
